items.title: London Cyberattacks Confirmed — Security Experts Issue Multiple Warnings

items.title: Google’s Hot New AI Coding Tool Was Hacked A Day After Launch
items.description: A security researcher discovered a major flaw in the coding product, the latest example of companies rushing out AI tools vulnerable to hacking.

items.title: iOS 26.2 Update—Here’s What’s Landing On Your iPhone Next Month
items.description: Apple’s iOS 26.2 is coming soon, along with a bunch of cool new features for your iPhone. Here’s what to expect from the latest update.
